thread.title: How to Look Smarter

author: Sue Shellenbarger
title: How to Look Smarter
text:
Q:You’ve written about trying to look smart. I sometimes try to appear and sound smarter when speaking to someone, but I don’t get the attention or respect I want.
—R.K.
A:Trying to look smart often backfires, making your behavior appear strained and unnatural and drawing attention to what you don’t... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
